rules_text:
When Exquisite Coaxer enters the battlefield, gain control of target creature an opponent controls with converted mana cost 2 or less until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.
Evanesce {1}{R}{R} [i](You may cast this card as though it had flash for its evanesce cost. If you do, exile it when it enters the battlefield.)[/i]
